blocks.text: Freelance website builder, web developer, and logo designer from Belgium. Learn more about myself and discover how I can assist you.

services.title: Webdesign
services.text: Er voor zorgen dat uw website of webapplicatie zichtbaar wordt op Google (of eender welke search engines zoals DuckDuckGo) zoekresultaten om meer gebruikers aan te trekken met social media platformen, contentmarketing, webanalyse en meer.

services.title: Webdevelopment
services.text: Allerlei soorten webapplicaties met databases zoals webshops, administratie apps en meer. Alles wat u nodig heeft om uw zaak te vergemakkelijken.

services.title: Logo Ontwerp
services.text: Ik ontwerp simpel en/of aangepast logo voor uw zaak. Met toepassing op uniciteit zorg ik er voor dat uw bedrijf en uw merk juist vertegenwoordigen. Grafisch ontwerp is een grote hit.

services.title: SEO & marketing
services.text: Er voor zorgen dat uw website of webapplicatie zichtbaar wordt op Google (of eender welke search engines zoals DuckDuckGo) zoekresultaten om meer gebruikers aan te trekken met social media platformen, contentmarketing, webanalyse en meer.

blocks.title: Who am I
blocks.subtitle: Bio
blocks.summary: Web designer | Web developer | Logo Design
blocks.text: Freelance website builder and logo designer from Belgium. With a bachelor's degree in Software Engineering and years of professional work experience, I deliver tailor-made digital solutions focusing on your business' needs. I perform various roles: web designer, web developer, logo designer, etc.

blocks.title: Why me
blocks.subtitle: Selling points
blocks.text: I am a freelancer/self-employed with my own web agency. This means that unlike a software agency/company, I am your sole person to communicate and work with. I provide various types of digital solutions. Whether it's simple business websites, administration apps with login systems, food delivery apps, webshops, etc., with excellent SEO scores. In other words, anything that needs to appear on the screen online/offline, I complete it. A digital solution doesn't necessarily have to be 'a business website'. Ultimately, with the right technologies behind my back, hosting can be extremely cheap or even free.

img.alt: Enormous green question mark with decoration.

blocks.title: List of options
blocks.subtitle: Services
blocks.text: An overview of the most commonly requested services that clients typically ask to implement in their digital solution(s). Of course, there are many more.

serviceDetails.title: Excellent Performance & Best Practices
serviceDetails.description: Your website(s) or web application(s) will have an excellent score when it comes to performance, speed, accessibility, and best practices.

serviceDetails.title: Mobile Friendly & Responsive
serviceDetails.description: Your solution(s) will be displayed correctly on every device, whether it's a smartphone, tablet, laptop, etc.

serviceDetails.title: Excellent SEO & Visibility
serviceDetails.description: During the development of your app(s), I ensure excellent SEO to optimize your business on various search engines such as Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo, and more. Eventually, I will provide you with an overview of digital marketing to further increase the visibility of your business if you wish. Of course, this is at no cost.

serviceDetails.title: Hosting Included & Very Affordable
serviceDetails.description: Hosting is straightforward; I take care of it. With extensive knowledge of software engineering, hosting will be very affordable or even free depending on the size and requirements of your app(s).

serviceDetails.title: Hybrid Web App & Mobile
serviceDetails.description: Your web app/website can also be installed as a standalone app on the home screen of your smartphone. Great, isn't it?

serviceDetails.title: Various Integrations & Third Parties
serviceDetails.description: Sending notifications/emails/SMS messages for every new customer you receive. Or maybe you need a separate mobile app to see how many users visited your website. Or to find out in real-time who ordered what. The possibilities are endless. This task is not intended for a web designer but for a software developer or engineer. This is my niche.

serviceDetails.title: Maintenance & Expansion
serviceDetails.description: Do you need improvements or new features in your website/app that I developed for you? Let me handle it further. You don't have to bother yourself by finding someone else. I ensure that your app can continue to grow.

serviceDetails.title: Graphic Logo Design
serviceDetails.description: If you don't have a logo for your business, I am your suitable candidate. I create both simple and professional logos to ensure your uniqueness.

serviceDetails.title: Digital Marketing
serviceDetails.description: I ensure that your business gets regular customer traffic through social media platforms, content marketing, web analytics, and research. I offer the most suitable methods based on your niche, profession, and location.
